content:
There is now a Confluence page https://confluence.hl7.org/display/CR/COVID-19+Related+Projects which is a table of COVID-related projects which may be of interest to HL7 members.
Your project may already be on there. If so, please check it and update the details - entries are a bit incomplete. Or contact me if you want to add an entry.
I've updated the link to the SANER project.
